headline: Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT) Wins Two U.S. Department of Defense Contract Modifications, Totaling About $48.6 Million
summary: Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) is one of the 10 Best Defense Contractor Stocks to Buy Now. On September 19, 2025, Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) won two U.S. Department of Defense contract modifications, totaling about $48.6 million. The first adjustment, worth $29.4 million, relates to a Joint Air-to-Surface Standoff Missile enterprise software contract, lifting its total […]
